RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 53. Maiden Claiming Purse 14000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD. Weight, 120 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FLASHY BOY GOES broke well, pressured the winner from the outside for a half, dueled in the two path then took over midway on the turn, clear into the lane, increased advantage through the stretch under his own courage to win ridden out. EASY EDDIE A settled off the early pace while three wide up the backstretch, asked along midway on the turn, proved no match in the run to the wire, clearly second best. FREE FALLING NATE behind the two leaders off the rail, crept a bit closer midway on the turn, went evenly through the lane to finish up best of the rest while not a threat to the top pair. SACRED NATION fell back to trail soon after the start, continued to late early turn, came four wide for the drive, picked off a couple of tiring rivals without posing a serious threat. TRIPLE RED ACES showed the way out of the chute, continued to set the pace up the backstretch, dueled through the early part of the turn then began to give wai, continued to weaken stretch. POWER MASTER last to leave, remained back in failing to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Free Falling Nate
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind pace off rail, crept closer midway on the turn, even drive

ENTRY.NAME: Triple Red Aces
ENTRY.COMMENT: showed way out of chute, pace inside, dueled, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Easy Eddie A
ENTRY.OWNER: Ardoin Farms LLC and Prejean Raymond
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace three wide, no match, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Power Master
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Flashy Boy Goes
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, pressed relaxed pace, took over, drew off, ridden out

ENTRY.NAME: Sacred Nation
ENTRY.OWNER: ELCO Racing LLC and Gallineau Dwayne
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell back to trail, passed tiring rivals while 4w

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 88. Claiming Purse 11000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 25, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $4,000. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SERMONONTHEMOUNT close from the start, moved up to duel in the two path after a half, put that rival away turning for home, steadily pulled away while kept to p4ressure. MIAS MOONBEAM last to leave, void of early foot in trailing for six furlongs, came four to five wide into the stretch, rallied out in the strip, nod for the place at the wire. BIG MONEY MACHINE lacked early foot, advanced into a contending position three wide late in the final turn, flattened out in the drive, nipped for the runner up spot at the wire. MASTERLY broke on top showed the way into the first turn, continued to set the pace onto the backstretch, responded and dueled with the winner when that challenged after a half, began to give way late in the final bend. OVERTHOUGHT settled off the pace, lacked a closing response. GUITARZAN within striking distance early, began a steady fade before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Sermononthemount
ENTRY.COMMENT: close from start, moved to duel after 1/2 2p,pulled away

ENTRY.NAME: Masterly
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace inside, dueled, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Guitarzan
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance for a half, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Big Money Machine
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked early foot, advanced 3w 2nd turn, flattened, nipped 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Mias Moonbeam
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, void of early foot, 5w rally, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Overthought
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, lacked closing response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 7 1/2F Turf CR: 69. Claiming Purse 22000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MS. CAJUN QUEEN outrun past the wire the first time in the three path, moved two wide through the first turn, launched a quick move along the rail into the far turn, collared the leader late in that bend to that one's outside, pulled away steadily through the stretch. CZAR'S BALLERINA last to leave, void of speed for six furlongs, raced four wide out of the final turn, rallied to finish up willingly and earn the place, not a serious threat to the winner. MADISON'S SCREEN in the second flight toward the inside, came out into the far turn to bother a couple of outer rivals, three wide into the stretch, came out again sharply while under a left handed crop to once again bother rivals. SKY HIGH SUSAN in the second flight while between horses, put in tight then was forced to check when MADISION'S SCREEN came out, was going evenly through the lane when bothered by that same foe late, slowly getting to that one for the show spot final strides. SERIOUSLY SAM another who raced in the second group, bothered on the outside into the far turn when MADISON'S SCREEN came out, came four wide for the drive, bothered again by that same rival who was lugging out. PSEUDOSCIENCE lacked speed, continued to lag while saving ground second turn, improved through the lane, bothered late in some traffic. SERAPE broke on top, narrowly showed the way into and through the first turn, dueled onto the backstretch, quickly shook clear before a half, faltered when headed by the winner late in the final turn. SUGAR STAR remained back while racing three wide. MRS. NECAISE in the second flight early, beat a steady retreat before a half. FOLLOWING CLAIMS OF FOUL BY THE RIDERS OF SKY HIGH SUSAN AND SERIOUSLYT SAM AGAINST MADISION'S SCREEN FOR INTERFERENCE AND A STEWARDS' INQUIRY, THE LATTER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM THIRD AND PLACED FIFTH.

ENTRY.NAME: Pseudoscience
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, saved ground into lane, improved, bothered late

ENTRY.NAME: Czar's Ballerina
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, void of speed, 4w rally 2nd, no threat winner

ENTRY.NAME: dq-Madison's Screen
ENTRY.OWNER: Autumn Hill Farms Racing Stables, Inc.
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, came out 3/8, bothered foes, again late

ENTRY.NAME: Serape
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, dueled early, shook clear, faltered when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Mrs. Necaise
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Sky High Susan
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight btwn foes, tight, checked 3/8, bothered again late

ENTRY.NAME: Sugar Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back while three wide

ENTRY.NAME: Ms. Cajun Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: outrun early 2p, quick move inside, collared foe, drew well clear

ENTRY.NAME: Seriously Sam
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd group outside, bothered 3/8, 4w into lane, bothered late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 49. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MULETRAIN forwardly placed, asked along while saving ground into the lane, in tight along the rail past the furlong marker, showed good determination to be up in tight at the wire. COUNT ON RAIN dueled up front while off the inside, larger lead in the two path midway on the turn, allowed the winner the inside upper stretch, came in slightly to tighten that foe up a furlong out, continued to lead late, missed. GOLDEN CONFUSION forwardly placed while racing three wide, continued to press the issue into the lane, not enough in the late going. CHAHTA SIA lacked speed outside, raced four wide through the turn, improved position out in the strip through the lane with some mild interest, no threat to the top three. LORD HELP ME off a step slow, trailed early toward the inside, improved position inside of several foes into the lane, flattened out a bit in the late going. INDEFENSIBLE TOWN went one paced off the inside. GLITTER STORM in mid pack, had little for the drive. UNCLE CHAN broke forwardly, dueled off the inside, began to give way midway on the turn, continued to falter through the stretch. DIXIELAND STORMING finished early while racing well wide. FINAL WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Help Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, trailed early,improved inside

ENTRY.NAME: Glitter Storm
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack, had little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: Count On Rain
ENTRY.OWNER: Benoit James Bourque Peggy and Bourque Sr Bobby
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled off inside, larger lead 2p, allowed winner rail,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Muletrain
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, saved ground into lane, tight rail 1/8, up

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Chan
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke forwardly, dueled early, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Confusion
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 3w, not enough late

ENTRY.NAME: Chahta Sia
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, four wide turn, improved position

ENTRY.NAME: Indefensible Town
ENTRY.COMMENT: one paced off the inside

ENTRY.NAME: Dixieland Storming
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early while well wide

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 1M Turf CR: 89. Allowance Purse 31000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Weight, 120 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 25, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 25, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Race s Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BRITE OUTLOOK broke sharp but outward to help tighten up a couple of outer rivals, set or forced the pace along the inside inherited a narrow advantage late in the final turn, headed entering the stretch, dug in gamely late to narrowly prevail. GLUCKSTADT in the second flight early, bit closer along the inside second turn, steered out three wide for the drive just behind the two leaders, lost some ground to that pair into the straight, late run outside to challenge, missed. DONEGAL FACTOR stalked the pace while off the inside, moved inside a foe second turn to get closer, tried the winner from the outside entering the stretch, briefly put a head in front then went flat late while between the top two at the wire. BUTLER CABIN in tight at the start, raced back early as a result while saving ground, some belated interest inside, lacked closing punch. SIR LIAM in at the break, four wide into the first turn when off the pace, continued off the inside, four wide again into the stretch, failed to rally. F J'S FLACO remained back in failing to menace. QUIET AS MIDNIGHT off slowly, never a factor. TALK TO TOKEY restless in the gate, broke in, quickly straightened to duel outside the winner, continued to alternate up the backstretch, got out in the far turn and gave way, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: F J's Flaco
ENTRY.COMMENT: remained back in failing to menace

ENTRY.NAME: Donegal Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace 3w,bid into lane,led btwn calls, flat late btwn foes

ENTRY.NAME: Brite Outlook
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke sharp, set or forced pace, headed, gamely late

ENTRY.NAME: Sir Liam
ENTRY.OWNER: Oak Tree Stables LLC (Powell and O'Brien)
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight start, 4w first turn, again 1/4, lacked rally

ENTRY.NAME: Butler Cabin
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight start, back, closer inside, lacked late punch

ENTRY.NAME: Talk to Tokey
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, dueled 2p, got out 2nd turn, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Quiet as Midnight
ENTRY.OWNER: PoBoy Racing LLC and Metoyer Rand S
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Gluckstadt
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight inside,moved out 3w, late bid, missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 1M Dirt CR: 79. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES IN 2022 - 2023. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: DEALIN' STELEN allowed the pace to go early, came three wide under encouragement into the stretch, continued to chase past the furlong marker, late push to be up in time. BAND BOSS broke on top set a soft pace along the inside, extended that advantage past the furlong marker, weakened late to be caught by the winner, managed to save the place. GUITAR TRIBUTE settled off the pace and the inside, roused four wide into the lane, late run to annex the show. APPLEWOOD pressed the soft fractions while off the inside, continued to race forwardly into and through upper stretch, had little left late to lose. EAST LEX void of speed, displayed a mild amount of late interest. TAKEN BACK last to leave, trailed early, improved a bit the third quarter then flattened out in the drive. FINAL TIME WAS HAND TIMED DUE TO TIMER MALFUNCTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Band Boss
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, soft pace, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Dealin' Stelen
ENTRY.COMMENT: allowed pace to go, 3w into lane, late push to be up at wire

ENTRY.NAME: Guitar Tribute
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled off the pace, up late show

ENTRY.NAME: East Lex
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, some mild late interest outside

ENTRY.NAME: Applewood
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed soft pace off the inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Taken Back
ENTRY.OWNER: Landry Judy and Landry Robert J
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, trailed, improved into lane, flat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 102. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 33000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $15,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER ON THE TURF SINCE NOVEMBER 25, 2022 OR CLAIMING PRICE $30,000. Three Year Olds, 1 18 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 25, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race Since March 25, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet ).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FIRST GLIMPSE closest to the off the inside, continued pursuit the middle half, challenged into the lane, dueled to the wire, drifted in carrying that foe into the gap late under a right handed crop, narrowly prevailed. FORTUITY shook clear before a quarter in showing the way, rated in the run up the backstretch and into the far turn, let out a notch into the lane, extended stretch duel, carried in late to miss. BUDRO TALKING lacked speed outside, dropped in a bit turning for home when called on for run, split foes past the furlong marker and finished willingly to be closing the gap on the top two late. UNCLE FRANK raced in mid pack and off the inside, raced under stout restraint up the backstretch, second flight into the stretch, roused when straightened for home, not enough for the top three at the end. PEACOCK KITTEN raced off the pace while saving ground, improved by cutting the corner into the straight, flattened out in the late going. SNIVELING within striking distance for six furlongs, came up empty for the drive. CHARLIE G back off the pace, raced in some traffic into the far turn, came up empty for the stretch run. STRONG EAGLE four wide in the first turn when off the pace, had little left for the stretch run. FOLLOWING A CLAIM OF FOUL BY THE RIDER OF FORTUITY AGAINST FIRST GLIMPSE FOR INTERFERENCE IN DEEP STRETCH AND A STEWARDS' INQUIRY, THE LATTER WAS DISQUALIFIED FROM FIRST AND PLACED SECOND.

ENTRY.NAME: Charlie G
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off pace, some traffic 3/8, no serious bid

ENTRY.NAME: Sniveling
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, empty drive

ENTRY.NAME: Peacock Kitten
ENTRY.OWNER: BW and HTS Stables LLC and Grudzien Jason G
ENTRY.COMMENT: off the pace, tightly bunched, cut the corner, flattened

ENTRY.NAME: Budro Talking
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed outside,4w 2nd turn,split foes, willingly

ENTRY.NAME: Fortuity
ENTRY.COMMENT: shook clear before quarter, pace inside, carried in late

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w 1st turn, little left stretch

ENTRY.NAME: dq-First Glimpse
ENTRY.COMMENT: closest to leader, bid, extended duel, drifted in late

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Frank
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight pace, pulled, not enough late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 64. Maiden Claiming Purse 12000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CARLOS' BLAST with the early pace while ,between foes, dueled through the turn in the two path, shook clear entering the stretch and maintained a daylight advantage to the wire under steady handling. ASTROLOGY WONOWON vied early three wide and outside the winner, fell back off the two leaders through the turn, continued to pursue into the stretch, could do little with the winner late, narrowly retained the second spot closest to the inside of the second flight. ADMIRAL AFLEET in mid pack early while off the inside, four wide out of the turn, late bid for the place, missed. MEAN MEISTER with the pace along the inside, dueled along the rail through the turn with the winner, weakened. ST PIERRE broke to the outside, lacked any early speed, failed to menace. BASTI BLUE in tight at the start, went one paced throughout in failing to threaten. R AND R STAR was finished early, well back. D'FESTIVE CAT in the second flight early, steadily faded, well beaten. CAME OUT KICKIN broke in to help tighten up BASTI BLUE, fell further and further back,distanced after losing contact with the field, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: St Pierre
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out, back, no menace

ENTRY.NAME: Basti Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight start, one paced, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Came Out Kickin
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, brush, far back, distanced,jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Mean Meister
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Carlos' Blast
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early between foes, dueled turn, shook clear

ENTRY.NAME: Admiral Afleet
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off the inside, outside bid 2nd,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Astrology Wonowon
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 3w btwn, chased duel turn, no late gain, nod 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: R and R Star
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, well back

ENTRY.NAME: D'festive Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight, steady fade
